title: Edge 24 in. Poly Blade Snow Pusher and Ice Chopper Blue
description: Make winter chores much easier with the Snow Joe Edge 2-in-1 Snow Shovel. It is ergonomic, lightweight and eliminates the need to use a heavy shovel and ice chopper because the two tools are combined. Featuring a 24-in x 11-in poly scoop and D-Grip handle to easily handle all snow types this tool gets the job done. Tackle the snow and ice and it is built to last with the steel wear strip for durability.
